snippet: Joe Montana, one of the greatest clutch quarterbacks in NFL history, and eight members of the Pittsburgh Steelers franchise were among those voted to the Super Bowl 50 Golden Team unveiled on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: Joe Montana, one of the greatest clutch quarterbacks in NFL history, and eight members of the Pittsburgh Steelers franchise were among those voted to the Super Bowl 50 Golden Team unveiled on Thursday.

headline.main: Montana, Eight Steelers Headline Super Bowl Golden Team
headline.print_headline: Montana, Eight Steelers Headline Super Bowl Golden Team
